ComicInfo.Summary:
A battle over one hundred years in the making - sister vs. sister! No one gets out unscathed! Not every bodily limb survives!
PLUS: In 1920s Paris, Glory teams and Ernest Hemingway take down the greatest villain the city has ever known, illustrated by New Yorker cartoonist ROMAN MURADOV!
